sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'; import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorder'; import ThumbUpOffAltIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUpOffAlt'; import {Users} from "../../dummyData" export default function Post({post}) { const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id == 1) return (
Babak 5 minutes ago
{post?.desc}
{post.like} orcs like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
